title: [Self-Directed] Microlearning-Based Intensive Short-Term Course for Online Teaching Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and general understanding of educational activities
context.additional_context: Mid-scale adult learner course conducting non-real-time online learning in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply fundamental instructional design principles within one week using microlearning content
Learners can understand the Just-In-Time learning model and create immediately actionable educational materials in real-world settings
Learners can design formative assessment tools accessible in mobile environments to measure learning effectiveness

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
